General.Name: Frenkel Topping Group
General.Description: Frenkel Topping Group Plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides independent financial advisory,  discretionary fund management, and financial services in the United Kingdom. It also offers trauma signposting, forensic accountancy, care and case management, and medico-legal reporting services. Frenkel Topping Group Plc was founded in 1979 and is based in Manchester, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Frenkel House, Manchester, United Kingdom, M50 2ZY
